answers.answer: I had an ultrasound friday and my baby measured a little over 29 weeks and at the time I was 27 weeks. they said my son was almost 2 pounds 10 ounces....when I asked they said he may just be going through a growth spurt, but said nothing to concern me. I just pray I dont have gestational diabetes.  I'll find out soon enough  I wouldn't stress it!

question: So I'm 29 weeks 2 days but I keep thinking my ultrasound Thursday baby was measuring 31-32 weeks. She didn't tell me but I saw it measured to that she said he was a good sized baby with a shocked face. But I'm just wondering like am I 29 weeks or 32?? My due dates not calculated byy my lmp by the way I never got a period I was on implanon before pregnancy so I never had a period
title: help, confused!!!?
